message.body: Hello, hugamorg. Are you having rain like we are?
Earlier. Somewhat stopped.
Hmm.actually that sounds like ours at this point. I'm in Philly.
Me to. Rain caught me by surprise
Hey, don't you check the forecast?
Nope
:-P Well actually I don't always either, but I keep an umbrella in my pack.
Did you manage to start more or less dry?
Start -> stay
Yup. At bar now with umbrella
guest bed #1 as a surface. The cat is very offended - "That's *my* spot!" - because #1 is now piled with, I think TEN pillows.
Makes sense, a good place to be if you're having a good time. And well equipped for the trip home. Me, i'm sorting out the stuff on guest bed #2, using
Using what?
Anout cats amd guest bed
Jurgen: Makes sense, a good place to be if you're having a good time. And well equipped for the trip home. Me, i'm sorting out the stuff on guest bed #2, using
(Sorry, the smartphone was almost out of charge and I had to leave it plugged in as I went around the house)
I meant 1. At a bar is a good place to be s long as you're having a good time, & in storm weather having an umbrella, you're equipped for it.
s annoyed.
I'm using. Preferably on me! But tonight I was taking the stuff off of #2 and sorting it into piles on #1, so there was no space for kitty. And kitty wa
So I put human words in her mouth.
Good Night!
Oh rats, I finally realized what you meant.It looks like part of 1 txt got lost. Here (next msg)
d with, I think TEN pillows.
Me, i'm sorting out the stuff on guest bed #2, using guest bed #1 as a surface. The cat is very offended - "That's *my* spot!" - because #1 is now pile
Haha
And now she's meowing outside the bedroom door bc she wants to be fed or petted or both. And I just got up & have to get dressed and out. Have a good day!
